title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 406.3 - Social services reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 406.3 - Social services reporting

State Regulations
(a) Random moment survey (RMS). For the purpose of determining costs of providing social
services, social services districts designated by the department must
participate in a random moment survey which must be conducted in a manner
prescribed by the department. (b) Other reporting. The social services district shall provide additional
data in such form and at such times as the department may from time to time
require and shall cooperate with the department in verifying the accuracy of
reports. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18

406.3

Amended

New

York State Register June 3, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 22, eff. 6/3/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
